author: andschwa
body:
- [ ] Linux / OS X packages _should_ include default system-wide profiles
- [ ] Path setup for default shell on OS X should work #975
- [ ] Better shebang support #1103 and #992
- [ ] Conflicting PowerShell aliases should be optionally available #3610 
- [x] Removal of unsupported cmdlets from modules #1122 
- [ ] Error handling for native tools, like `set -e`  (need issue)
- [x] Reasonable default colors #1036 
- [x] Proper native pipeline support #559 
- [x] Path normalization of filenames with backslashes #1115
- [x] Path globbing for native commands #954
- [x] Default Emacs keybindings #1388
